medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with 3 days of malaise and 1 day of abdominal pain, which started after going to bed feeling unwell. Woke up at 4am with sharp right/periumbilical abdominal pain. Reports nausea and self-induced emesis four times without relief. Patient has felt hot and cold intermittently today.
medical_history.family_history: Prostate cancer in father, GERD in mother.
